flawed_nl_solution:
After the birds ate 19 of the tomatoes Haruto has 127 - 19 = <<127-19=110>>110 tomatoes left.
After giving half of his tomatoes to his friend, Haruto had 110 / 2 = <<110/2=55>>55 tomatoes.
#### 55

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 108, not 110. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
